name: _fire_
description:
!Submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1!/!Theme was "Stronger Together"!

_fire_ is a short game where the words gun, wall and fighter are added to the word _fire_ to make it stronger! 

Depending on the word you will have different powers and you will have to change your playstyle!

Controls: WASD/Arrow Keys + Mouse

Average session: Around 5 minutes.

Leave feedback in the comments if you would like to, and most importantly have fun! :)

Tools:

Art - Piskel

Sfx -  Audacity

Music - Bosca Ceoil

(Also, if you are a gamedev and you haven't joined a game jam before, I 100% recommend it! This was my first and it was really fun!)
